Articles.Content: I've been watching alot of tutorials on Utube, and  I noticed some of the videos, they have all six nav markers to the left of the ball. not just the retrograde and prograde markers. Is there a mod to add the other 4 markers (normal, anti-normal, radial and anti-radial) to the left of the ball?

1 hour ago, [email protected] said:

I've been watching alot of tutorials on Utube, and  I noticed some of the videos, they have all six nav markers to the left of the ball. not just the retrograde and prograde markers. Is there a mod to add the other 4 markers (normal, anti-normal, radial and anti-radial) to the left of the ball?

That's where they always are.  If you're playing career,  your pilots just aren't experienced enough yet.
A level 2 pilot adds Normal/anti-normal & radail/anti-radial.  Level 3 pilot adds target/anti-target & maneuver.  Higher tech drone cores do the same.
Yip.. you only get all of them at game start, when you play sandbox mode.
